SELECT no,giverNo,categoryNo,name,price,photo,subCount,star,revCount,regdate, r FROM(SELECT no,giverNo,categoryNo,name,price,photo,subCount,star,revCount, regdate,rownum r FROM (SELECT no,giver_no giverNo,category_no categoryNo,name,price,photo,sub_count subCount,star,rev_count revCount,regdate FROM products)) WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} AND giverNo=#{giverNo}
ORDER BY subCount DESC
ORDER BY regdate DESC
ORDER BY price
ORDER BY price DESC
ORDER BY star DESC
select company from givers g, products p where p.no=#{productNo} AND p.giver_no=g.no
